description: This header file contains function prototypes for internal APIs of the Sys Setup Manager component, including functions for state management, auditing, session control, and RCM interface notifications.

methods.name: SysSmoGetSetupRfo
methods.description: Retrieves the setup RFO handle associated with the object.

methods.name: SysSmoGetSysRcmIf
methods.description: Retrieves the system RCM interface handle.

methods.name: SysSmoReactRfoAdded
methods.description: Handles reaction to RFO addition events.

methods.name: SysSmoReactRfoDeleted
methods.description: Handles reaction to RFO deletion events.

methods.name: SysSmoReactRroAdded
methods.description: Handles reaction to RRO addition events.

methods.name: SysSmoReactRroModified
methods.description: Handles reaction to RRO modification events.

methods.name: SysSmoReactRroDeleted
methods.description: Handles reaction to RRO deletion events.

methods.name: SysSmoInitSetUpAccess
methods.description: Initializes setup access with a provided access key.

methods.name: SysSmoStopSetUpAccess
methods.description: Stops setup access with a provided access key.

methods.name: SysSmoRcmNotify
methods.description: Notifies RCM of an event related to a folder.

methods.name: SysSmoRcmInit
methods.description: Initializes RCM interface for a folder.

methods.name: SysSmoRcmStop
methods.description: Stops RCM interface for a folder.
